content: Thanks for sharing. I’m myself a bipolar and I loved your descriptions on depression and especially on mania. I laughed nervouslly because I could see me in every paragraph. I felt not alone. Let’s keep on going…It’s funny to be positive, but still, for some reason, I think we should and we will surviver this nightmare. Without loosing ourselves or our sense of humor. btw.: lovely writing! Cheers, to all bipolar people. ❤
